column4: I'm trying to ssh into my desktop with my correct username/password but I am getting a "Failed password for invalid user...." in my /var/log/auth.log. Any ideas?
are you using the proper "ssh username@ipaddress" format? or just "ssh ipaddress"?
however i am able to login to my computer locally, its ssh the problem
its also happens for all users on the computer... not just mine
can you connect to ssh on that machine using "ssh user@localhost"?
what is the error on that desktop?
i cant log in using ssh ....
couldnt i simply reinstall ssh and see ?
yes...but whats the error for "ssh localhost" on the ssh server?
where would I see that? Currently all i know is that in /var/log/auth.log Im getting a Failed password for invalid user ...
on the desktop that is acting as the ssh server?
ok...open a terminal on that desktop..and type "ssh localhost"...and then give the error..
Im also seeing a User USERNAME from amon not allowed because not listed in AllowUsers
When I open a terminal and go "ssh localhost" I type my password and get a "Permission denied, please try again"
